summary: Lazada seller account bind for big bag pick up
description: Lazada seller account bind for big bag pick up

query.name: client
query.description: ISV名称ISV：ISV-ISV英文或拼音名称、商家ERP：SELLER-商家英文或拼音名称

query.name: sellerList
query.description: 授权商家列表最多一次传50

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/cnpms/account/bind')
request.add_api_parameter("userInfo", "{\"appUserKey\":\"-\"}")
request.add_api_parameter("client", "test")
request.add_api_parameter("remark", "\u5907\u6CE8")
request.add_api_parameter("sellerList", "[{\"country\":\"MY\",\"sellerId\":\"2143243\",\"sellerName\":\"test\",\"shortCode\":\"MY1234\"}]")
request.add_api_parameter("locale", "zh_CN")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/cnpms/account/bind')
request.add_api_param('userInfo', '{\"appUserKey\":\"-\"}')
request.add_api_param('client', 'test')
request.add_api_param('remark', '\u5907\u6CE8')
request.add_api_param('sellerList', '[{\"country\":\"MY\",\"sellerId\":\"2143243\",\"sellerName\":\"test\",\"shortCode\":\"MY1234\"}]')
request.add_api_param('locale', 'zh_CN')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.message: query lzd merchant seller not found
